item.description:
John Hurwitch and Gene Briskman, counselors at SCORE (Service Corps of Retired Executives), will give an informal overview of SCORE and how it helps individuals starting businesses and bringing products to market. John was a co-owner and CEO of an upscale woman's clothing chain, who then became a consultant to hospitals and other enterprises, improving their performance and profitability. Gene owns a marketing and business consulting firm, is involved with industrial manufacturing and private equity.

Arrive as early as 6:30 to network with others. The meeting starts promptly at 7:00. A map of MIT showing the meeting location is at http://whereis.mit.ed.... Street parking is suggested on Ames Street, Vassar Street or Memorial Drive. Most MIT buildings have easy access and are interconnected.
item.name: Inventors Association of New England November Meetup
